info.title: TON API
info.description: API for interacting with The Open Network (TON) blockchain

get.description: Retrieves a list of Jetton burn events for a specific Jetton address from the TON blockchain

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address of the Jetton master contract

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of burn events to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of burn events to skip before starting to return results

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sorting order of the burn events

address.description: The address of the Jetton master contract
The address of the account that burned the Jettons

comment.description: Any comment attached to the burn event
